summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein discussing travel plans and a request for accommodation in New York City. The email indicates a personal connection and desire to meet.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing his travel plans and a request for accommodation.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein sent an email regarding his travel plans to New York City.
The email indicates a personal relationship with the recipient, referred to as 'J'.
Epstein is looking for accommodation during his stay in New York City.
